name: Mary Ann MILLER, Appellant, v. ROYAL INSURANCE COMPANY

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
parties: Mary Ann MILLER, Appellant, v. ROYAL INSURANCE COMPANY.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
535 A.2d 1049
Mary Ann MILLER, Appellant, v. ROYAL INSURANCE COMPANY.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 9, 1987.
Decided Jan. 19, 1988.
Michael B. Egan, Philadelphia, Richard C. Angino, Harrisburg, for amicus curiae — Pa. Trial Lawyers Assoc.
George D. Sheehan, Jr., James C. Haggerty, Philadelphia, for amicus curiae — Pa. Defense Inst.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
